channel.title: Work on Cross Process Design House
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Cross Process Design House

item.title: THE BEST SWEATER [ Virtual Art Gallery ]
item.description: A collection of recent drawings exploring inner landscapes. Like an oversized sweater on a rainy day, pencil on paper just feels good.

item.title: THE EVENT BARRICADE [ Product Marketing Site ]
item.description: Instead of a PDF or Powerpoint, this digital deck is a stand-alone website making use of Hugo, a static site generator, along with the Hugo-Reveal theme to create a full-screen slideshow that’s easy to pull up on any device or send as a link via email.

item.title: TO TRY THE MOUNTAIN PASSES [ 200-Page Hardcover Coffee Table Book ]
item.description: With over 500 portraits of PCT hikers to showcase, the objective with this book was to make the design disappear. We wanted to create a presentation format that was consistent enough to direct all the focus toward the portraits, but varied enough to keep the reader’s interest.

item.title: ART OF ASHTANGA [ Yoga Teacher Training Manuals ]
item.description: A series of training manuals and cheat sheets featuring over 70 hand-drawn pencil illustrations of each pose in the ashtanga yoga primary series.
